vision.tagline: EVA isn’t just a chatbot — it’s a shared AI platform.
vision.core_idea: A faceless AI brain exposing reusable RAG, document, ingestion, safety, and agent services via APIs consumed by many UIs and solutions.

eva_foundation.description: Core backend on Azure hosting GenAI, RAG, document, ingestion, and safety services.
tech_stack: Azure Functions / Logic Apps / Web Apps
PostgreSQL and storage for config and logs

eva_domain_assistant.role: Primary RAG UI for project-based domain assistants.
features: Project dropdown with dynamic theming (e.g., red for Canada Life, blue for Jurisprudence).
EN/FR toggle and personalization controls (font size, contrast).
Admin screens with accordion sections for UI, RAG, safety, data sources, prompts.

eva_liveops.role: Central ops console for monitoring and management.
capabilities: Usage and cost dashboards via APIM headers.

eva_da_workspace_portal.role: Self-service entry point for requesting and configuring Domain Assistant spaces.
capabilities: Project requests with metadata and governance routing.
Hooks into IIAID for environment provisioning.

shared_services_and_agents.role: Reusable services and future agent orchestration capabilities.
agent_vision: EVA APIs consumable by external agents (e.g., SK, AutoGen).
EVA-hosted agents orchestrating tools behind UIs.

project_registry.purpose: Source of truth for all EVA project spaces and their configuration.
categories: Project metadata (owner, sponsor, cost center, classification, status).
UI configuration (themes, text, localization, a11y defaults).
RAG configuration (index, chunking, retrieval parameters, prompts).
Data sources (SharePoint, file shares, web, APIs).
Safety & policy (allowed content, PII handling, disclaimers).

tool_catalog.purpose: Expose all EVA services and metadata so UIs and agents can dynamically bind to tools.

governance_hooks: AI Review Panel, AI Register, AIOB integration.
Terms of Use gating and user accountability.
